name: Robot Explorer (Povelitel-Blinow)
description:
You control a robot explorer on the surface of an unusual planet. Crystals with unusual properties grow on it. Scientists are extremely interested in them. Your task is to collect samples and deliver them to the lander.

Robot controls:

A - D  to move

W - S  to compess linking part

Q - E  to rotate linking part

1 - 2  to change leading body

Space  to take samples
